dmca.title: [EV1-C1705517O] Takedown request http://www.unknown-insanity.com (IBO)
dmca.body:
Andrea Almeida, Associate General Counsel Legal Department The Planet Internet Services, Inc. http://www.theplanet.com/legal/ Dear Andrea Almeida *NOTIFICATION OF CLAIMED INFRINGEMENT* In accordance with your requirements, and in line with the *DIGITAL MILLENNIUM COPYRIGHT ACT, *I provide here information to verify the ownership by the International Baccalaureate Organization (IBO) of works that are being infringed on the site http://www.unknown-insanity.com/ibuploader/uploads/ to enable you to take the necessary action. *1.* Detailed identity of the copyrighted work that I believe has been infringed upon * Examination paper and markschemes from May and November examination sessions, 1999 to 2006, published and owned by the IBO, in print, CD-ROM and digital download. [See http://store.ibo.org/index.php?cPath=23_59_119 * Hundreds of pdf files of past examination papers and related markschemes sold for teacher use and for the preparation of high school students around the world who study the Diploma Programme of the IBO (see www.ibo.org ). These individual works (examples attached) are available for sale at http://store.ibo.org/index.php?cPath=23_59_60. * Each examination paper is published four months after candidates sit the examination where the grade achieved will count towards the award of the IB Diploma * The URL of the site where material has been posted that infringes our copyright is: http://www.unknown-insanity.com/ibuploader/uploads/ *2.* Identity of the material that I claim is infringing upon the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above. Since there are so many files posted I attach a Word file showing two screen dumps of the page identified above. Each pdf file listed represents a separate copyright work. The folders each contain a further long list of separate copyright works. *3. * Location of the author copyright notice (for information). The copyright identity and policy of the IBO can be found at http://www.ibo.org/copyright/index.cfm The cover sheet of each of the works bears the registered logo and name of the IBO in its three working languages. (See attached samples.) *I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the infringing web pages is not authorized by my registered copyright and by the law. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I represent the organization that is the copyright owner of an exclusive right that is infringed.* * * *Yours sincerely* *Pat Adams * Rights Manager, Publications Group International Baccalaureate Organization Peterson House Malthouse Avenue Cardiff Gate Cardiff CF23 8GL United Kingdom Tel: +44 29 20547733 E-mail: pata@ibo.org IBO LOGO*Pat Adams* *Rights manager Publications group* * pat.adams@ibo.org ( +44 (29) 2054 7733 8 IB store Copyright wrote: > To Whom It May Concern: > > Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not > substantially comply with the required notification elements of the > Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). > > Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your > claim. > > Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright. > > Legal Response Team > THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. > > > -----Original Message----- > From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] > Posted At: Wednesday, November 08, 2006 2:32 AM > Posted To: Copyright > Conversation: [EV1-C1705517O] Takedown request > http://www.unknown-insanity.com > Subject: [EV1-C1705517O] Takedown request > http://www.unknown-insanity.com > > > ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== > 1. Takedown request http://www.unknown-insanity.com Added by system at > Tuesday, Nov 7 2006 05:41 am > X-MailFrom: pat.adams@ibo.org > X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net > Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for > ; Tue Nov 7 05:40:03 2006 > Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by > smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); > Tue, 7 Nov 2006 05:39:17 -0600 > Return-path: > Delivery-date: Tue, 07 Nov 2006 05:39:17 -0600 > Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] > helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from > pat.adams@ibo.org) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) > (Exim) > id 1GhPIT-0006DK-CW > for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 07 Nov 2006 05:39:17 -0600 > Received: from imap.ibo.org ([194.82.135.53]) by > mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from pat.adams@ibo.org) with esmtp > (Exim) > id 1GhPIR-000NiT-9m > for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 07 Nov 2006 05:39:15 -0600 > Received: from [172.16.11.96] ([172.16.11.96]) by imap.ibo.org > (Netscape Messaging Server 4.15) with ESMTP id J8CZ1A00.D5C; > Tue, 7 Nov 2006 11:39:10 +0000 > Message-ID: <4550705E.8040008@ibo.org> > Date: Tue, 07 Nov 2006 11:39:10 +0000 > From: "Pat Adams" > User-Agent: Thunderbird 1.5.0.5 (Windows/20060719) > MIME-Version: 1.0 > To: abuse@theplanet.com > CC: Graham Eglinton > Subject: Takedown request http://www.unknown-insanity.com > Content-Type: multipart/alternative; > boundary="------------030803040107020002020802" > Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 194.82.135.53 is neither > permitted nor denied by domain of ibo.org) client-ip=194.82.135.53; > envelope-from=pat.adams@ibo.org; helo=imap.ibo.org; > X-OriginalArrivalTime: 07 Nov 2006 11:39:17.0829 (UTC) > FILETIME=[5BC85F50:01C70261] > > (multipart/alternative) > Multipart prefix (text/plain) > This is a multi-part message in MIME format. > MIME element (text/plain) > Dear administrator > > I have to bring the following site to your attention > http://www.unknown-insanity.com and in particular the page that contains > numerous pdf files that are the copyright of the International > Baccalaureate Organization: > http://www.unknown-insanity.com/ibuploader/uploads/ > > Use of this material is, of course, breaking copyright law and, in > addition, causing a lot of difficulty to schools around the world that > want to use these files legitimately. You are the ISP of this personal > website and I request that you close the site down until the offending > files are removed. > > I look forward to hearing from you. > > Yours > . > Pat Adams > -- > > IBO LOGO*Pat Adams* > *Rights manager > Publications group* > > * pat.adams@ibo.org ( +44 (29) 2054 7733 > 8 IB store > > > > > > (multipart/related) > MIME element (text/html) > > > > http-equiv="Content-Type"> > > > Dear administrator
>
> I have to bring the following site to your attention > href="http://www.unknown-insanity.com">http://www.unknown-insanity.com a> and in particular the page that > contains numerous pdf files that are the copyright of the International > Baccalaureate Organization: > href="http://www.unknown-insanity.com/ibuploader/uploads/">http://www.un > known-insanity.com/ibuploader/uploads/
>
> Use of this material is, of course, breaking copyright law and, in > addition, causing a lot of difficulty to schools around the world that > want to use these files legitimately. You are the ISP of this personal > website and I request that you close the site down until the offending > files are removed.
>
> I look forward to hearing from you.
>
> Yours
> .
> Pat Adams
>
--
